name: JumboJSLibary
short_description: JumboJSLibrary is a Javascript Library that makes it easy and simple to right code. Currently, there is one person working on this project, so there may be ALOT of bugs, if you find a bug, just contact me, I will take a look and try to fix it. Currently, there are 2 different parts to the whole library, that is JumboCanvasJS and JumboWindowJS. JumboCanvasJS makes it easier to draw on the <canvas> tag in HTML. The JumboWindowJS adds custom custom alert, confirm, and prompt boxes, easily added to your website by one line of code. Thank you for using JumboJSLibrary!
summary: Javascript Library, making it easy and simple to right code.
